attributes.action: Issue UK troops based in Iraq and Afghanisatan with the equipment they need to stay alive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK servicemen and women are dying in theatres of war because the government does not issue the correct equipment to them. Armoured landrovers, flak jackets, enough ammo etc. Give them the equipment to get the job done and to save their lives. No more lives should be lost unncessarily due to lack of equipment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
